name: scalarv002_28052021
description: This new form of art is dedicated to the procedural geometry and generative sound. Processed in real time by manipulating with self programmed algorithm created by V4w.enko. The new reality of the virtual world involves us to join the journey in the "scalar" direction where we flight through the surfaces of sound and visual . Originally captured screen from the real time processed openGL geometry. Scanning the new dimension with a new kind of perception. 1280*1024px, 27sec, stereo
